text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board of County Commissioners" means the Board of County Commissioners of Queen Anne's County.

section.section: "Housing project" means a work or undertaking to provide housing for persons of eligible income.

"Housing project" includes:
buildings, land, improvements, and other real or personal property that is planned, acquired, owned, used, developed, reconstructed, rehabilitated, or improved; and
streets, roads, sewers, water service, and supporting public or private commercial, educational, cultural, recreational, community, and civic facilities that are needed for sound community development.

text.section: "Person of eligible income" means an individual or a family that lacks sufficient income or assets without financial assistance to live in decent, safe, and sanitary housing without overcrowding.
"Queen Anne's Authority" means the Housing Authority of Queen Anne's County.
